t: ANIMAL METAPHORS IN STOICISM (PART 1): THE BULL AND THE LION – DONALD J. ROBERTSON
s: December 10, 2022 - This article (part 1) explores some of the animal metaphors found in Stoic literature, particularly the analogy of the "bull and the lion", mentioned in Tom Wolfe's novel A Man in Full (1998).
